title: Giant's Kitchen Adventure #59
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Giant Kitchen Floor
rooms.description: You stand on the vast tiled floor of an enormous kitchen. Everything is scaled to giant proportions - a table leg towers above you like a tree trunk, and a dropped spoon looks like a metal canoe. Crumbs the size of boulders are scattered about. The air smells of bread and herbs. A mouse hole in the baseboard offers shelter, and a rope dangles from the counter above.

items.name: mouse hole
items.description: A small opening in the baseboard, just your size

items.name: tiny brass key
items.description: A small key that fits your scale perfectly

items.name: giant bread crumb
items.description: A crumb the size of a boulder, still fresh and soft

items.name: torn recipe paper
items.description: A piece of paper with writing on it
items.text: Recipe fragment: '...Giant Greta's Famous Stew, created in the year 1847. The secret ingredient is kept in the spice cabinet. Remember: 1-8-4-7 opens the special drawer.'

items.name: fallen matchbox
items.description: A giant matchbox that fell from the counter. It has a small compartment with a combination lock.

items.name: copper key
items.description: A key made of copper with a spoon symbol engraved on it

items.name: giant dropped spoon
items.description: An enormous spoon lying on the floor like a metal boat

items.name: kitchen note
items.description: A note written in giant handwriting
items.text: Reminder to self: Giant Greta - Don't forget to check the pantry for supplies. The counter drawer has my special tools. The window latch key is in the locked tin on the counter.

items.name: rope hanging from counter
items.description: A rope or string hanging down from the counter above, climbable to reach the higher level

rooms.name: Kitchen Counter
rooms.description: You've climbed up to the giant's kitchen counter. Massive jars of flour and sugar loom like silos. A cutting board stretches out like a wooden plaza. A locked tin sits near the edge, and a drawer is built into the counter. Through a nearby window, you can see the outside world - freedom is so close!

items.name: giant flour jar
items.description: An enormous glass jar filled with white flour

items.name: massive cutting board
items.description: A wooden cutting board with knife marks and vegetable scraps

items.name: shopping list
items.description: A list written by the giant
items.text: Shopping List: Need more ingredients for my famous stew. Giant Greta's recipe has been in the family since 1847. Must organize the pantry better - it's getting cluttered!

items.name: counter drawer
items.description: A drawer built into the counter with a copper lock

items.name: silver key
items.description: A silver key with a window symbol etched into it

items.name: Giant Greta's diary
items.description: A diary with entries from the giant
items.text: Diary Entry: My name is Giant Greta, and I've lived in this cottage since I was young. My famous stew recipe is my pride and joy. I keep the window locked for safety, but the key is in my special tin on the counter.

items.name: locked tin container
items.description: A decorative tin with a small keyhole

items.name: window latch key
items.description: A key specifically designed to unlock the window latch

items.name: kitchen window
items.description: A large window overlooking the garden outside. The latch is locked, but there's a keyhole. Beyond lies freedom!

rooms.name: Window Ledge Outside
rooms.description: You've made it outside! You're standing on the window ledge of the giant's cottage. Fresh air fills your lungs, and the sun warms your face. Below, you can see a vine growing up the wall - an easy climb down to the garden and freedom. You've escaped the Giant's Kitchen!

items.name: thick climbing vine
items.description: A sturdy vine growing up the cottage wall, perfect for climbing down to safety

items.name: view of the garden
items.description: A beautiful garden stretches below, with flowers and vegetables growing in neat rows

rooms.win_message: Success! You've escaped from the Giant's Kitchen! You climb down the vine to the garden below and make your way to safety. The giant's cottage grows smaller behind you as you journey toward home. Your adventure in the land of giants is over - you've solved the puzzles and won your freedom. You win!
